page.title: 04The School Building
page.content: My school,Swanbourne C.of E.First School,was built in 1832 with 3 classrooms. In 1963 one classroom was changed into an office and a staff toilet and a store-room and a corridor leading to a new cloakroom, classroom and kitchen. This was because Little Horwood School closed and the children came here.My classroom is the biggest room in the old building. It is 7.5m x 6m and there are 19 children in the class. There is a glass folding partition between my class and the next classroom. The middle classroom is 4.5m x 7.5m and it is used for Physical Education,drama,television, painting,and the library.The new class- room is 9m x 7.5m and is used for Assembly,dinners,P.E.,concerts,and meetings.20 children work in this room. Outside is a shed which has been turned into a playhouse.
